text:
Feng Wang presented the paper
		[*CPU Isofurace Ray Tracing of Adaptive Mesh Refinement Data*](/publications/amr)
			at [VIS 2018](http://ieeevis.org/year/2018/welcome) in Berlin.

Invited to attendin the program [Science at Extreme Scales: Where Big Data Meets Large-Scale Computing](https://www.ipam.ucla.edu/programs/workshops/workshop-i-big-data-meets-large-scale-computing/) at the Institute for Pure & Applied Mathematics (IPAM), UCLA, Los Angeles.

Chuck Hansen presented our paper
		[*VisIt-OSPRay: Toward an Exascale Volume Visualization System*](/publications/visit-ospray)
			at [EGPGV18](http://egpgv.org/) in Brno.
